document_data.name: Maridan
document_data.size2e: Tiny<ref group="note">The water gen's size is given as small in the source, but with one foot and less they are actually tiny.
document_data.mainbody: '''Maridans''', also called '''sea gen''' or '''water gen''', were [[gen]] native to the [[Elemental Plane of Water]].
document_data.Description: Sea gen resembled their element with greenish skin and blue hair and eyes. Seaweed and other flotsam was often tangled in their hair. Maridans enjoyed wearing decorations from the sea such as pearls or beautiful shells.
document_data.Personality: Maridans were wild and playful creatures. A [[sha'ir]] ran the risk of hurting their maridan's feelings if they did not play along with their pranks and playfulness.
